A bill to amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to make the Reclamation Water Settlements Fund permanent.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Hoeven with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 116-189.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 397.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
The committee substitute withdrawn by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
Indian Water Rights Settlement Extension Act
This bill makes the Reclamation Water Settlements Fund permanent. Currently, it terminates at the end of FY2034.
